FuncDef: The display bgp sr-policy ipv6 routing-table command displays information about the IPv6 SR-Policy routes.
Examples: Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
Network                                    Nexthop        MED        LocPrf    PrefVal Path/Ogn
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Display information about the IPv6 SR-Policy routes.
